mapper.insert: INSERT INTO search (id, title, content, postdate ) values (#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW() )
mapper.update: update search set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, postdate = NOW() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from ( select id, title, content, postdate from search where title like concat ('%',#{keyword},'%') order by title desc) as T1 limit #{skip},#{amount}
